title: Finding Relative Frequency
body: Often, cruise ships conduct all on-board transactions, with the exception of gambling, on a cashless basis. At the end of the cruise, guests pay one bill that covers all onboard transactions. Suppose that 60 single travelers and 70 couples were surveyed as to their on-board bills for a seven-day cruise from Los Angeles to the Mexican Riviera. Following is a summary of the bills for each group.\n##figure1.gif
lesson: 2.2 Histograms, Frequency Polygons, and Time Series Graphs
